程序包 com.shapeville.game

类 AngleCalculation

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.game.AngleCalculation
public class AngleCalculation extends Object
A class that handles angle type calculations and scoring in the ShapeVille game. This class manages the identification of different angle types and tracks the player's progress.
从以下版本开始:
2024-05-01
版本:
1.0
作者:
Ye Jin, Jian Wang, Zijie Long, Tianyun Zhang, Xianzhi Dong

      public AngleCalculation()

  • 方法详细资料

    • getAngleTypes

      public String[] getAngleTypes()
      Gets the array of possible angle types.
      返回:
      Array of angle type strings

    • getIdentifiedTypes

      public Set<String> getIdentifiedTypes()
      Gets the set of angle types that have been correctly identified.
      返回:
      Set of identified angle types

    • getAngleType

      public String getAngleType(int angle)
      Determines the type of angle based on its measure in degrees.
      参数:
      angle - The angle measure in degrees
      返回:
      The type of angle as a string ("acute", "right", "obtuse", "straight", "reflex", or "unknown")

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(int angle, String answer)
      Checks if the provided answer matches the correct angle type.
      参数:
      angle - The angle measure to check
      answer - The user's answer
      返回:
      true if the answer is correct, false otherwise

    • isTypeIdentified

      public boolean isTypeIdentified(String type)
      Checks if a specific angle type has been identified.
      参数:
      type - The angle type to check
      返回:
      true if the type has been identified, false otherwise

    • addIdentifiedType

      public void addIdentifiedType(String type)
      Adds a newly identified angle type to the set.
      参数:
      type - The angle type to add

    • isTaskComplete

      public boolean isTaskComplete()
      Checks if the required number of angle types have been identified.
      返回:
      true if the task is complete, false otherwise

    • incrementTotalQuestions

      public void incrementTotalQuestions()
      Increments the total number of attempted questions.

    • getTotalQuestions

      public int getTotalQuestions()
      Gets the total number of attempted questions.
      返回:
      The total number of questions attempted

    • calculateScore

      public int calculateScore(List<Integer> attempts)
      Calculates the total score based on the number of attempts for each question. 3 points for correct answer on first attempt 2 points for correct answer on second attempt 1 point for correct answer on third attempt
      参数:
      attempts - List of attempt counts for each question
      返回:
      The total score

    • getMaxPossibleScore

      public int getMaxPossibleScore()
      Calculates the maximum possible score based on total questions.
      返回:
      The maximum possible score

    • getRemainingTypesMessage

      public String getRemainingTypesMessage()
      Gets a message indicating the remaining number of angle types to identify.
      返回:
      A status message about remaining angle types
